competitors.name: Vonage (Nexmo)
competitors.notes: Early cloud communications provider, later acquired Nexmo API platform

competitors.name: Traditional Telecom Carriers
competitors.notes: AT&T, Verizon and other carriers provided basic telephony services but lacked developer-friendly APIs

competitors.name: Tropo (Cisco)
competitors.notes: Early cloud communications API platform, later acquired by Cisco

context: In 2010, Twilio was still a very new entrant (founded 2008) in the emerging cloud communications API market. The CPaaS (Communications Platform as a Service) market was nascent. Most competitors were traditional telecom carriers without developer-friendly APIs. Few direct API competitors existed at this time - Twilio was pioneering the developer-first communications API model. The market was dominated by legacy telecommunications infrastructure rather than API-based platforms.
